name: Kushantha Charuka Community Passport (Community)
description:
I'm a Sri Lanka based UI/UX Designer, Traveler, Amateur Photographer, and yeah Gamer. By day, I work for Platformer Cloud and runs the Friends of Figma, Sri Lanka


I’m striving to create emotional connections through design and I believe that’s what makes design great. I also enjoy writing about design and often share my thoughts with the design community online.


Beyond work, I also love volunteering, doing sessions to empower people and bring new knowledge to them and strongly believe in giving back to the community.
